parameters.name: DIJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the synchronization task.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: SourceDatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database in the source.

parameters.name: SourceSchemaName
parameters.description: The name of the schema of the source.

parameters.name: SourceTableName
parameters.description: The name of the table in the source.
